name: Locationlabs.github.io
body:
### Welcome to Location Lab's GitHub Pages.

#### Confab
Confab is a Configuration Management tool, built on top of Fabric.
Confab provides mechanisms to generate and manage configuration files using data related to the context in which the configuration will be deployed.

#### MockRedis

MockRedis enables python developers to mock out interactions with redis in unit tests

#### About Location Labs
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
